title: (x) Luther North - Seagull {Mike Yanega}
content: anyone have an idea what this font is and where to find/buy it. ![luther north](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518051313im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/16422.jpg)
author: silly

comments.content: The font is "Seagull" by Adrian Williams. It's been sized variously to serve in logo fashion, but that's the font. See Bitstream & URW versions at MyFonts.com at [http://www.myfonts.com/Search?searchtype=adv\_fonts&go=1&searchtext=Seagull&boolean=and&minprice=%240.00&maxprice=%241000.00&characterset%5B%5D=ALL&foundry%5B%5D=0](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518051313/http:/www.myfonts.com/Search?searchtype=adv_fonts&go=1&searchtext=Seagull&boolean=and&minprice=%240.00&maxprice=%241000.00&characterset%5B%5D=ALL&foundry%5B%5D=0)
